name: Enigma (itch) (CruelGames)
description:
Enigma - 2D platformer with puzzle elements
The game has a large number of levels. from the easiest to the most difficultIn the game you need to activate the portal which is at the beginning of the level and return from the end of the level to return to the very beginning, which greatly complicates the passage
Many interesting levels:

  • Parkour Levels
  • Boss Battles
  • Vertical Levels
